title: 游戏崩溃
author: jerry_Rom
txt_content:
[16:55:06] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[16:55:06] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[16:55:06] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...
[16:55:06] [Game Launcher/INFO] Detecting libraries...
[16:55:06] [Game Launcher/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.4.2.63
  Time: 2016-07-10 16:55:06
  Thread: Thread[Game Launcher,6,main]

  Content: 
    java.lang.NullPointerException

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.version.MinecraftLibrary.getDownloadInfo(MinecraftLibrary.java:142)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.download.MinecraftDownloadService.getDownloadLibraries(MinecraftDownloadService.java:60)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.launch.GameLauncher.makeLaunchCommand(GameLauncher.java:102)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.util.HMCLGameLauncher$1.run(HMCLGameLauncher.java:88)



-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 10 (amd64), 10.0
  Java Version: 1.8.0_60, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
换旧版HMCL或其他启动器。
还有，系统盘全盘搜索.HMCL，搜到后把内部的jar文件统统删掉。

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
jerry_Rom 发表于 2016-7-10 17:26
没搜到有jar格式的文件啊
那直接换旧版HMCL试试，不行的话换启动器。

replies.author: 雾晨丶破晓
replies.txt_content:
在C盘中打开 用户-用户名-AppData-Roaming  
删除.HMCL文件
之后下载旧版HMCL试试
旧版HMCL上面貌似有人发过了
这里
